In this work, we develop and release Llama 2, a family of pretrained and fine-tuned LLMs, Llama 2 and Llama 2-Chat , at scales up to 70B parameters. On the series of helpfulness and safety benchmarks we tested, Llama 2-Chat models generally perform better than existing open-source models. They also appear to be on par with some of the closed-source models, at least on the human evaluations we performed (see Figures1and3).
